I love the feel and fit of this outfit.  I relied heavily on customer reviews and they didnt disappoint. The fabric is light but perfect for lounging or adding accessories to jazz it up. It was just as described and I can't wait to wear it.  I'm going to at least get 1 more color.5'2" 215lb

This item was made larger than l thought and the material started to bead up after l time wearing this it looks old

Loved it so comfortable
I'm 6' plus size, This fits perfect.  an never go wrong with navy blue. I may wear a blue and white strip under the solid.
Better than expected. Soft, comfortable  and fits nicely.

评论概述: This is a nice pair of soft PJs - not a leisure wear outfit
评论详情: This is a pair of soft cozy pajamas. this is not a leisure wear or sweat suit outfit.  The material is soft pajama material.  I am keeping it as a pair of pajamas but this isn't something for wearing outside of the house in my opinion.
The outfit is as advertised, looks nice and the material is very soft. If you’re petite, the outfit can be overwhelming on your figure. The pants too long and the shirt is too wide.
Super thin material.
This product does not wash well at all. I washed mine and hung it up to dry. Fabric is piled and looks horrible.
This is a good quality, extremely comfortable set!  The color is gorgeous.  I split them up and I wear them together.  I need to get more colors!
Didn’t care for the quality of fabric.
I love this outfit. Fits like it says.
So glad that I purchased this set. It is super comfortable and yet great to make a dash out of the house in. Light weigh but still warm for the cooler weather. Defiantly a 5 Star

I am very disappointed with this. They look like pajamas. The fabric is very thin and feels like pajamas. The sizing is completely off as well. The size small pants fit like an extra extra small. And the size small top is extremely wide and boxy yet the sleeves are too short. And the color blue is not a nice shade of blue.

评论概述: Two piece of of pants and top
评论详情: This out fit can be used with a scarf for going on to nicer places and without the scarf just to hang around in

评论概述: Love the product, but there are some selling flaws
评论详情: Want to give these a five star, but a couple of the seams were not sewn together. One on the inner thigh area and one in the pocket. Material and look are excellent, but sometimes the sewing is off. I have purchased several of these types of outfits and generally really love them. Material is good and soft on the skin. Very comfortable wish quality assurance was a little bit better especially for the price.

I was expecting this to be a little more comfortable a little thicker. It is very thin material and is very very oversized. I’m traditionally a size small the top fit more like a medium. It’s very baggy.
Super comfy! Thinner than I thought but it was thick enough to wear to school. Fit good and the color was a bright red!

Nice styling. Material is about the weight of a thicker t-shirt.  Very comfortable. I ordered a Med.  Top fits roomy, not baggy.  The sleeve length is great for me, as I prefer active wear tops to extend below wrist.  The Medium pants are loose fitting,  but far from baggy. Love the perfect-sized pockets.  Well tailored IMO. They have a 28" inseam, if you include the half-inch elastic cuff.Washing instructions are Not written, just symbols... which I've never seen before. Don't know what a triangle shape with a slanted line through it means, but overall I think I've deciphered: Cold water, gentle wash, Not dryer safe, but can be ironed... 🤔. Based on that, I suspect there may be a shrinkage problem, but I hope for the best by using the air-only dryer setting.

I’ve got 4 of this brands jog sets. So comfy. Wash and dry beautifully. I was thrilled with this set because it is a true, rich brown. Warm, but not stifling. I wear these at home, but could easy wear them to run errands…if I weren’t retired and prefer my cozy home. I’m 5’7” 180lbs and got an Xl.
Perfect fit and very comfortable
High quality material. Stylish design and flattering.

I absolutely love this two-piece set! The fabric is incredibly soft and just the right thickness—not too heavy, but still cozy. It’s perfect for anyone who works from home and wants to be comfortable while still feeling put together for the day.  What I love most is its versatility—you can easily dress it up with accessories like a beanie, jacket, necklace, and cute tennis shoes for a stylish, casual look when running errands or meeting up with friends. I’m so impressed that I’ll definitely be purchasing this in multiple colors! Highly recommend!
The elastic in the waistband is twisting.  Sorry I bought it.
Super comfy and the pockets, drawstring and cuff make it so you don't feel like you've been in your jammies all day! 🤣Recommend!!
Very nice outfit. Looks great no matter were you wear it. I feel it runs a little big. I got a large and it’s a little big but still very comfortable. The material feels so soft.
This is not what I expected. It more long pajama material very thin and flimsy.  Not something I would wear out running errands.  Just laying around the house.

This little outfit was OK for the airport, but my usual Medium looked like a tent, had no shape, and looked too "slouchy" for my taste. Also, the material is Not 100% cotton, so I felt way too hot/sweaty but not in a cozy way. I wore it once, then into the "donate" bin.

The bottoms are horrible. The waistline rolls and the elastic twists up after first wash. I weigh 130lbs and the medium cuts into my mid section. They don’t stretch to fit properly. The shirt would be fine except the sleeves are too short. A medium hits just above the wrists. I’m 5’7.
very comfortable, love all Amazon has to offer, the delivery is great too
Purchased the navy blue/stripe. I’m ordering more because I don’t want to take it off! It’s very comfortable and fits well. I’m 5’5 145 lbs. fits me perfect!
If the product ran true to size I would’ve bought more colors but it runs big you’re small it’s more like a medium to large I washed it dried it and it’s still the same
Got this in the mail yesterday & looked so great straight out of the package that I wore it to my son's birthday dinner.  Was very soft & comfortable, great buy!

Received this for Christmas when I went to open the bag, this is what I Received.  Looks like it was worn and returned.  Spots all over the shirt, hole in the pants. Needles to say it is going back. Color is really cute, but that's about it. Not sure if i would recommend.

So thought the pants fit a bit snug and maybe it was holiday eating but top fits great. Found out after washing before 1st wear they sent a smaller size for the bottoms… PLEASE CHECK INSIDE TAGS OF SIZES BEFORE WEAR/wash
So frickin cute!  I recieve many compliments and questions on where I purchased this.  Good quality and length.  Probably buying aging in a different color
So I feel the photo is misleading !
This is a very cute sweat shirt , but it’s gets really baggy after wearing it once

This outfit is not acceptable. The elastic in the waistline  rolls over making it uncomfortable and tight. The most basic sewing instructions tell you to tack down elastic so it will stay in place and be comfortable.
Disappointed in material.  Sizing not accurate.  Poor quality.
I wear it all the time

I purchased the Navy on sale. The color is as pictured. The style is very flattering. Im almost 5'7 and 150LBs and I got a M. My stomach is my problem area and I think it hides it well. The material is soft. Not too think or thick. Comfy enough to sleep or work out in. Even though I have no complaints, the 4 stars is for the value. Even on sale, it was overpriced. It's a good purchase but nothing blew me away.
Suits look good but material seems a little thin.  Will probably wear as pjs!!

I knew that there was a chance that this would look like pajamas and it did.  The description of the product is accurate, but the photo shows just enough of the top behind the coffee and the bag to look like a sweatshirt.  It is not - it is a long sleeve t shirt.  If that's okay, this is for you.

There’s a little too big, but I was hoping if I washed and dried it, it would fit me better. It is still huge. I have washed it twice. Still big. There’s always a suggested size that Amazon suggest. It said to order a medium. A small would fit me just fine.
Good value. Really cute fit would buy different colors.My daughter loved it
Bought this set to wear on a very long flight. Very comfortable, even has pockets. Great purchase.
Great for travel

I have been searching for a cute sweatsuit and was really hoping that this would be the one. Let’s just say it looked much better on the model.  The fit seemed frumpy and not flattering. The material was nice and soft and the color was just like the photo.

I have purchased this set in three colors at this point. The material is so soft and comfortable, it feels like wearing pajamas but the material quality is nice enough that you look fashionable and cute out in public. It’s hard to find a set where both the top and bottom fit and this set hits the mark.
Super cute, light weight, well made

I’ve been on the hunt for cute lounge sets for my work-from-home days, and this one is comfortable and has great potential for looking good on camera. However, I’m giving it a 4-star rating because, while it’s cozy, it still looks a bit too much like a traditional lounge set. It would be harder to dress up or style for other occasions.  The fabric is a nice weight—definitely not cheap—and it’s super stretchy and comfortable. I appreciate the great length, especially since I’ve had issues with sleeve and inseam lengths in other sets. For reference, I’m 5'9", 215lbs, and a 38 DDDD/G. My inseam for flats is 33/34 inches and 36 inches with heels. These fit perfectly, and the cuffed design works well.  This set washes nicely with no noticeable shrinkage, and I bought an XXL. Overall, it’s a solid purchase for lounging, but not as versatile for dressing up.
I thought that this would be more like sweatshirt material but it is thin and flimsy and the pants were weird I returned it
One of my favorite comfy outfits for home

I loved the navy set.  The medium fit well BUT then I wore them no more than 3times and they started to nub.  I washed them carefully each time and hung them to dry.  On the 4th time of wearing them they were so nubby.  They were embarrassing to wear.  I'll try to remove the nubs but I strongly recommend Don't waste your money buying them!
So comfy and cute!
Very "comfy" lounge set , unfortunately  ordered X-Large and it's swimming on me ! Will return for exchange !

评论概述: They fit great & love them Soft & comfy!
评论详情: Again the only problem is made in China!
Love the navy blue color, very soft and comfortable
Very soft breathable material. Fit perfectly
Very cheap and thin
Cozy, light weight, and true to size.
I loved the comfort and color and lighter weight but after 2 gentle washes the top is starting to pill.

This is comfy but not the most flattering. Based on reviews I ordered up. It’s oversized and I definitely could have gotten my normal size or maybe sized down. The material is pretty thin. It’s not see through but I bought a dark color. I mostly wear it for lounging or traveling. I usually wear a tank underneath and sometimes leggings.

Received this set in dark gray for Christmas. Material was super soft, comfortable, and very flattering. Thickness was great as well. As a late 40’s woman - the hot flashes can hit anytime - this outfit was not too hot and not too thin. Would also be great for layering. I’m short (4’11’’) so the banded ankles help make the pants fall naturally to fit. Banding is perfect tightness too - not too tight, not too loose. Was the perfect outfit to wear to a relaxed comfortable attire NYE gathering. Will definitely be a travel day attire option too. I’m considering getting a second set in a different color!

I bought 3 sets as a gift with the assumption that they were sweatshirt material (Since this is what the description states).  They are, in fact, a thin t-shirt like fabric.  Not for warmth at all.  Colors were very pretty though.
The material is so soft it’s super comfy, fits perfectly extra large fits like an extra large and just love the nice color dark gray it was just really comfortable to wear
Bought this track set for my daughter. Looks great for running errands or just hanging out. Extremely soft material and reasonably priced.
Material is too thin

I got this as a gift. Love the color and fit, and the fabric has a nice feel and thickness. But it comes with an extremely itchy and impossible-to-rip tag near the waist of the shirt. That’s extra unacceptable for lounge wear! Unlike most clothing I’ve ever worn, this tag is sewn directly into the seam stitching and would NOT rip out with any coaxing, so I ended up cutting some thread in the process. Now I am mending a hole in a brand new shirt because of this stupid poor construction. I wouldn’t be surprised if it falls apart after a few washes.

After the first wash, the elastic in the waist twisted in a few places. It should have been anchored to the fabric so it wouldn't roll. The sleeves are different. They cinch at the bicep. It isn't uncomfortable, just didnt realize it in the photos. I purchased 2 colors: black and blue. The elastic rolled in both of them. Disappointed in the quality.
Flimsy and thin material
Fits great, lightweight, cute

I love the way this looked when I got the outfit and wore it with pride.  The fit was perfect. The size was xl. However, I shouldn’t have put this in the dryer even on an appropriate setting.  The sleeves shrunk tremendously; but the body of the top did not shrink at all.  No one could wear without laughter the ridiculous top I now have.
Color does not match description
Came in a timely manner and a good fit.
The materials were as described, and the product pictures and sizing were accurate.
It get super pilly and looks really old after the first wash.  It definitely appears to be cheaply made.
This brand always fits as expected and makes beautiful clothes. I order other brands and they don’t fit correctly and I return them. This is comfy and soft.

I Did Not purchase this product on Amazon, but it is so bad that I chose to leave a review here. Just Don’t Buy It!  It has to be the worse piece of clothing I have ever bought. Thank God I never wore it outside of the house. I have never seen so much fabric shedding in my life! Before washing & after. I had to run my washing machine twice just to get rid of the lint it left. And you can only imagine what my dryer looked like. After two wash and drying cycles, it continues to shed every where.
Good quality
The outfit did not disappoint. It was exactly as illustrated.  After washing, it’s soft with no shrinkage.  I would order again.

This set is so comfortable. I usually get way too warm, but this lightweight set is perfect. It is not see through, very comfortable, and can be dressed up or down. Long enough for my long arms&legs. Not too tight on the backside either.

评论概述: Warm, comfy, stylish and fits well!
评论详情: I bought this for my mom for Christmas and she ABSOLUTELY loves it! She immediately put it on after opening it. I got blue, her favorite color. She's 5'3 and 2X and she said the fit was perfect and so was the color. The cuffed ankles don't cut off her circulation and also prevents her from having to hem the bottoms. The material is soft and comfortable, not too thick or thin. She is thrilled. My sister was so impressed that she is now ordering one for herself.  I have a set as well and love it. This can be worn as pj's but also as loungewear when just hanging around the house or running errands. I highly recommend this product.

I enjoy the fit and feel of this outfit. However, after 1 wear traveling on a plane-so sitting on all soft surfaces-before even washing it, the back side of the pants is pilling. After washing, the pilling had other colored fibers stuck in that were near impossible to remove. It seems these pants have become house wear only and that is very disappointing as I would never spend that much on something I would only get 1 wear of out of the house. Would not purchase again and wish I could get my money back from this because it is such a disappointment!
This set is comfortable. You can wear it to run errands or wear it as pjs. It’s not very thick, so not super warm. The color is nice, more royal blue than navy. Got a size large and it fit well. TTS
They are so soft and comfortable!  My daughter ordered a pair too.
I have several Pretty Garden sets and it is an entirely different fabric. This material is too thin and doesn’t look as nice as old material. Very disappointed. Will wear as pajamas.

评论概述: Faded and blotchy after one wash
评论详情: I washed prior to wearing and the outfit came out faded and blotchy. I'm disappointed because this set was soft and fit well. It's unfortunate that the dye failed immediately.

These are super comfy, nice top and bottom! I bought xxl (just in case) the top form fitting comfy and the bottoms are little big around ankles but still overall happy and would buy again!!! Hard to find a set where top and bottom fit good!
I love the soft material and color. Super comfy. Great for travel and being cute around the house.

This looks perfect in the Amazon photo. It really life it’s just ok. The way one of the sleeves was put in made weird wrinkles across my chest. The top had no band on the bottom so to look decent it had to be tucked in, and I didn’t really like that. Was not expecting the fabric to be so thin; it’s more pajama weight than sweatsuit weight. The ankle elastic doesn’t fit just right and the pants legs kept creeping up my legs. If this “sweatsuit” doesn’t wash and dry nicely, I’ll be sending it back. A little disappointed as the overall quality could be better. There’s probably a better option out there, but I needed it right away and it arrived next day. I think I’d skip this one and find something else.
Poor quality. Didn't fit well or sit nicely on the body. I returned it.
These pjs are super soft and  comfortable. Hangs beautifully and looks super sporty. Sizes are generous. Might order a medium next time. Really love these pajamas and the price.
This item was very poor quality and extremely small for it's noted size.. Terrible product
I love this 2 piece lounge outfit! It’s true to size, made well- soft, light weight, doesn’t get little balls on it after the first wear/wash like the other brands I’ve bought recently!
Comfortable and as described
